metadata.title: USN-3672-1 -- Liblouis vulnerabilities
metadata.description: Henri Salo discovered that Liblouis incorrectly handled certain files. An attacker could possibly use this to execute arbitrary code. (CVE-2018-11683, CVE-2018-11684, CVE-2018-11685)  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-3672-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  liblouis9 - 2.6.4-2ubuntu0.3 liblouis-bin - 2.6.4-2ubuntu0.3 python-louis - 2.6.4-2ubuntu0.3 liblouis-dev - 2.6.4-2ubuntu0.3 python3-louis - 2.6.4-2ubuntu0.3 liblouis-data - 2.6.4-2ubuntu0.3 No subscription required
